title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.12 - Certification of question to the board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.12 - Certification of question to the board

State Regulations

When a claim presents a novel or important question of law
or a question of public policy, a referee before rendering his decision thereon
may certify such question to the board. In such a case the referee shall
develop the record on the question involved and submit to the board for
determination his findings of fact and the question presented by the record for
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
